paragraph: "Schedule a free and discreet consultation with an attorney today."
valueProp: Sessions & Kimball is Orange County’s oldest and largest employee rights law firm. We have been practicing employee rights since 1985 and have grown significantly along the way. We only represent employees in wrongful employment practices. That is the only type of case we handle! So whether your dispute involves discrimination, harassment, retaliation, unpaid wages, wrongful termination, or any other workplace wrong, we have the experience and resources to effectively and aggressively represent you. We are Southern California’s premier law firm exclusively devoted to employee rights. Speak with one of our attorneys today to learn your rights and how we can help you. Contact us today for a free consultation.
CTA: Schedule a free and discreet consultation with an attorney today.
